upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 1.10, 1.20, 1.30
* Restored parameter 1 with the following functionality: Values 10-50% with the default value of 20%.
* Fixed Bug: Fixed temperature and humidity reporting issues for small time intervals which affected selected hubs and scenarios.
